pullrequest.title: added logic to statically link FFTW to use conda numpy with MKL.

content.raw: I think a decent stdlib function to handle it is [distutils.util.strtobool](https://docs.python.org/3/distutils/apiref.html#distutils.util.strtobool), which will look for all of those kinds of things.  But it returns an integer 1/0 which then needs to be casted to a bool.  It might also be useful to throw in a print statement showing the determined value of “fftw\_static” to help debug installation procedures.  Happy to add these in later if you don't want to bother now.
